alert.note: Alert for Hatteras Island; Northern Outer Banks; Ocracoke Island (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued November 08 at 4:58AM EST until November 09 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, up to 1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. For the High Surf Advisory, large breaking waves of 8 to 11 feet expected in the surf zone. * WHERE...Northern Outer Banks, Ocracoke Island and Hatteras Island. * WHEN...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, until 7 PM EST Wednesday. For the High Surf Advisory, from 4 PM this afternoon to 10 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Up to 2 feet of inundation above ground level is possible in some areas near shorelines and tidal waterways resulting in an elevated threat of property damage. Some roads and low lying property including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes adjacent to the waterfront will experience shallow flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest impacts will be around the time of high tide which will be around 7 AM today and around 8 AM Wednesday. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Duck NC MLLW Categories - Minor 5.5 ft, Moderate 6.0 ft, Major 6.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.8 ft, Moderate 2.3 ft, Major 2.8 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 08/07 AM 5.6 1.9 1.4 5-7 Minor 08/07 PM 5.1 1.4 1.8 8 None 09/07 AM 6.0 2.3 1.9 9 Moderate 09/08 PM 4.3 0.6 1.2 8 None 10/08 AM 4.9 1.2 0.8 6-7 None 10/09 PM 3.7 0.0 0.7 6 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. Inexperienced swimmers should remain out of the water due to dangerous surf conditions.

area.areaDesc: Hatteras Island; Northern Outer Banks; Ocracoke Island
